# selected

**Type Property**

The selected state of a control.

## Declaration

```swift
static var selected: UIControl.State { get }
```

## Discussion

For many controls, this state has no effect on behavior or appearance. Some subclasses, like the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UISegmentedControl] class, use this state to change their appearance. You can retrieve and set this value through the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIControl/isSelected] property.

## Constants

- **normal**: The normal, or default, state of a control where the control is enabled but neither selected nor highlighted.
- **highlighted**: The highlighted state of a control.
- **disabled**: The disabled state of a control.
- **focused**: The focused state of a control.
- **application**: Additional control-state flags available for app use.
- **reserved**: Control-state flags reserved for internal framework use.
